metadata.title: CVE-2022-24279 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The package madlib-object-utils before 0.1.8 are vulnerable to PrototypePollution via the setValue method, as it allows an attacker to merge objectprototypes into it. *Note:* This vulnerability derives from an incompletefix of[CVE-2020-7701](https://security.snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-MADLIBOBJECTUTILS-598676)

criterions.comment: madlib package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
